"そーんなに緊張しなさんなって！<br>わたしも見事にぺーぺーだから<br>仲良:
"あーっと、違う違う。
カタナの使い方だったね。
そうだった、そうだった。"

"まずはカタナを振ってみなよ？
そんでもって、さくっと１０体くらい
斬、斬、斬！\u3000って仕留める！"

"それでだいたいわかるはずだけど
そういえばカタナは持ってる？"

"無かったら話にならないからねー。
まずはあたしのおさがりをあげよう！
それ持ってがんばってー。"

"Katanas are fast, short-range striking weapons whose mix of offensive and defensive features make it easy for beginners to use them to fight enemies at close range.

<%WeaponActionText>: Guard, reducing damage taken from frontal attacks. Guard just before an attack hits you to prevent all damage and respond with a powerful counterattack."

"Try basic Katana attacks and Photon Arts for yourself.

They are specialised in continuous, quick-moving attacks that leave few gaps in your offence."
